job_title: Azure Data Engineer with Datastage Experience
jd: From: Austin, Wiseq austin@wiseq.net Reply to: austin@wiseq.net Job Title : Azure Data Engineer with Datastage ExperienceLocation : Chicago, IL (Hybrid)Long Term ContractJob Description Customer belongs to the BI-Analytics, looking for a candidate who is capable of building & deploying data warehouses with Azure platform required with AL/ML capabilities The candidate will be responsible for designing & building solutions for Analytics applications, analytics group. This role will cover multiple data technology stacks as well as cloud technologies.Responsibilities• Work with business owners and IT stakeholders to understand business and functional• requirements to design data & integration solutions.• Develop conceptual and physical data models as well as flow diagrams illustrate current and• future state data architecture.• Establish good data modelling principles and effective data quality standards.• Act as subject matter expert on all aspects of the data architecture, including Cloud• adoption, data orchestration, large data processing, security & scalability.• Guide and mentor development teams on modern data engineering & design best practices• You have strong understanding of data modeling techniques and experience in designing• data models for cloud data warehouses and OLTP applications.• Evangelize modern data approaches & technologies as well as Cloud architecture across the• Analytics group.Required Skills• 10+ years of experience building data platforms & application architectures.• Proven experience building & deploying data warehouses with Azure platform is required with AL/ML capabilities.• Azure certification is desirable.• Strong hands-on expertise in database & query performance tuning SQL queries and database best practices with PowerBI Dashboard Exp.• Full understanding of ETL IBM DataStage concepts and Data Warehousing concepts• Strong experience with modern data engineering technologies such as python, Spark, Airflow.• You have experience with Kafka and CDC tools for real-time data synchronization.• Proven experience in Data modeling using Dimension modelling & Data vault methodologies with Power BI reporting integration experience.• Strong Data Governance Tooling experience with Collibra.• Hands-on experience working with relational and NoSQL technologies (such as Oracle, Postgres, Mongo DB, etc.)• You have experience with continuous integration and collaboration tools like Azure ADO, GitHub and Confluence.• Experience in financial industry or banking is a plus
